spell.inspirations.lightning.name: Lightning
spell.inspirations.lightning.description: Allows the user to summon lightning
spell.inspirations.infected_dart.name: Infected Dart
spell.inspirations.infected_dart.descrip: Allows the user to conjure an arrow tipped with their current effects
spell.inspirations.natures_touch.name: Nature's Touch
spell.inspirations.natures_touch.descrip: Allows the user to quickly grow crops
spell.inspirations.douse.name: Douse
spell.inspirations.douse.description: Allows the user to gain fire resistance for a minute
spell.inspirations.fireball.name: Fireball
spell.inspirations.fireball.description: Allows the user to conjure a fireball that they can hit to launch
spell.inspirations.teleport.name: Teleport
death.attack.infection: %1$s got infected by their own poison dart
death.attack.infection.player: %1$s got infected by their own poison dart whilst fighting %2$s
